messages.content: The Garmin Forerunner 970 has a waterproof rating of 5ATM, which means it is suitable for swimming and showering at depths of up to 50 meters, although it is not recommended for recreational diving [1]. In contrast, the Apple Watch Series 11 also features a water resistance rating of up to 50 meters, making it similarly suitable for swimming and water activities [4]. Both watches are designed to withstand exposure to water, but neither is intended for deep-sea diving.
